product_name: Nite Ize BugLit Rear Bike Light
long_description: This Nite Ize BugLit rear bike light offers a bright red LED to alert others of your presence and mounts tool-free to just about anywhere on your bike. Bright LED is encased in a durable polycarbonate plastic housing; large rubberized button makes it easy to toggle between settings. 3 modes let you tailor your lighting needs between high, low and strobe. Attaching the BugLit is easy and tool-free, thanks to the flexible, grippy 6 in. "legs" that let you affix the light to your bike's handlebar, basket, frame, rack and more. Also includes a small "S" carabiner clip for other attachment options. Nite Ize BugLit rear bike light operates on 2 replaceable 2016 3V lithium batteries and has a run time between 10 and 22 hrs., depending on settings.
